ValidationRule.description: When Affiliation Type is Funding Vehicle and Related OCR used to be Funder - Soft Credit, make sure that it stays that way.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISPICKVAL(Affiliation_Type__c , "Funding Vehicle") && ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE( npsp__Related_Opportunity_Contact_Role__c), "Funder - Soft Credit") && ISCHANGED(npsp__Related_Opportunity_Contact_Role__c) && ISPICKVAL( npe5__Status__c , "Current")
ValidationRule.errorMessage: When the Affiliation Type is set to Funding Vehicle, the Related Opportunity Contact Role must be Funder - Soft Credit.
